slide1.title: Welcome to IYTE56
slide1.description: The forum app for IYTE students. Share your thoughts, ask questions, and connect with your campus community.

slide2.title: Your Privacy Matters
slide2.description: Post anonymously or publicly - it's your choice. Express yourself freely while your identity stays protected when you choose.

slide3.title: Safe Community
slide3.description: All content is moderated to ensure a respectful environment. Even anonymous posts are traceable for safety purposes.

slide4.title: Student Verification
slide4.description: To ensure you're an IYTE student, we'll send a verification link to your student email (@std.iyte.edu.tr).

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Enter your IYTE student email to receive a sign-in link
login.linkSentMessage: Sign in link has been sent to your email address. Please check your email.
login.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
login.invalidUsername: Please enter a valid username (letters, numbers, dots and underscores only)
login.invalidDomain: Please use your IYTE student email
login.sendError: An error occurred while sending the email
login.devModeHint: Dev mode: Enter your Gmail username
login.signInError: An error occurred while signing in

setup.title: Complete Your Profile
setup.subtitle: Set your display name and username to get started
setup.usernameHint: 3-30 characters, letters, numbers, dots and underscores only
setup.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
setup.usernameTooLong: Username must be 30 characters or less
setup.invalidUsername: Username can only contain letters, numbers, dots and underscores
setup.usernameTaken: This username is already taken. Please choose another.
setup.updateError: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
setup.notSignedIn: You are not signed in. Please sign in first.

verify.emailNotFound: Email address not found. Please try signing in again.
verify.invalidLink: Invalid link. Please use the link from your email.
verify.signInError: An error occurred while signing in

home.title: Home
home.empty: No posts yet. Be the first to post!

profile.title: Profile
profile.signOutMessage: Are you sure you want to sign out?
profile.signOutError: An error occurred while signing out

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteAccountMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. All your posts, comments, and data will be permanently deleted.
settings.deleteAccountError: An error occurred while deleting your account
settings.unblockAllMessage: Are you sure you want to unblock all {{count}} user(s)?
settings.unblockAllError: An error occurred while unblocking users
settings.noBlockedUsersMessage: You don't have any blocked users

editProfile.title: Edit Profile
editProfile.saveError: Failed to save profile. Please try again.

addPost.anonymousNote: Your identity will be hidden from other users, but your account info is still stored for moderation purposes.
addPost.permissionMessage: Please allow access to your photo library to add images.
addPost.submitError: Failed to create post. Please try again.
addPost.discardMessage: Are you sure you want to discard this post?

postDetail.title: Post
postDetail.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
postDetail.commentError: Failed to post comment. Please try again.

reportPost.title: Report Post
reportPost.subtitle: Why are you reporting this post?
reportPost.successMessage: Thank you for your report. We'll review it shortly.
reportPost.error: Failed to submit report. Please try again.

warning.title: Warning
warning.banWarning: {{count}} more warning{{plural}} and your account will be banned
warning.finalWarning: This is your final warning. Your account will be banned after 3 warnings.

postOptions.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this post? This action cannot be undone.
postOptions.blockUserMessage: Are you sure you want to block @{{username}}? You won't see their posts in your feed.

errors.imagePickerUnavailable: Image picker is not available. Please rebuild the app with native modules.
errors.imagePickerError: Failed to open image picker. Please try again.
